name: Instant Read Digital Meat Thermometer for Cooking & Grilling - Waterproof, Fast & Accurate Kitchen Food Thermometer with Backlight for BBQ, Oven, Beefsteak, Chicken Chop, Candy Making
short_description: [Easy to Use] This meat thermometer digital is ready to go right out of the box! It features a foldable 4.6 food-grade stainless steel probe and an auto on/off function—simply open the probe to activate it and fold it back to turn off. Its user-friendly design makes it easy to store and carry. With the included battery, you can start using it immediately [Ultra Fast and Accurate] This instant read thermometer delivers digital meat temperature readings in just 2-3 seconds and boasts an impressive accuracy of ±1°F across a wide range from -58°F to 572°F. Say goodbye to long waits by the stove or grill; get precise temperature readings for your food in an instant! For enhanced measurement precision, a calibration function is included. Ideal for cooking both indoors and outdoors, as well as grilling and BBQ [Waterproof and Strong] Every joint in this food thermometer is waterproof, featuring an IP67 rating that allows for easy cleaning under running water without worry. Made from strong ABS plastic, it withstands accidental drops and impacts. With its waterproof construction and exceptional break resistance, this food thermometer is both highly durable and resilient—making it ideal for outdoor grilling [High Definition Screen] Elevate your cooking experience with our thermometer that effortlessly switches between Celsius and Fahrenheit.The illuminated LCD display ensures you can read temperatures clearly, whether you're grilling outdoors or cooking at night. With this tool, you'll create mouth-watering meals with ease [Gift selection] It’s the perfect tool for food cooking, kitchen baking, grilling, baking, deep frying, making candy, or measuring the temperature of liquids like beer, wine, tea, coffee, milk, and soups. It can be given as a gift to parents or those in need

name: Cooking Thermometer,IP67 Waterproof Digital Meat Thermometer with Backlight, Calibration & Hold Function，Food Thermometer for Cooking,Outdoor Grilling,Candy Making
short_description: FAST RESPONSE, ACCURATE READINGS - This cooking thermometer is equipped with a 2mm thick stainless steel probe and a high-precision sensor. It only takes 2-3 seconds to easily obtain accurate temperature, with a temperature range of -50℃ to 300℃ (-58℉ to 572℉). Whether it is frying steak, grilling chicken, grilling, or frying, it can provide you with accurate temperature guidance to keep the food at its most delicious moment. THE DETAILS ARE EVEN MORE THOUGHTFUL - the digital meat thermometer is easy to operate and can be used by opening the probe. It will automatically shut down after three minutes of non-use to extend the battery life. The magnet and hanging hole design of the instant reading thermometer make it more convenient to store; the handle of the thermometer is also ergonomically designed, easy to grip, making every cooking a pleasure. LED LARGE SCREEN MAKES READING EASIER - The food thermometer has a large LED screen with built-in backlight, which makes it easy to get the temperature of food even when cooking outdoors and at night. The meat thermometer digital will automatically turn off the backlight in 4 seconds. Click the light button to light up the screen; click the "℃/℉CAL" button to switch between different temperatures, and click the "HOLD" button to fix the temperature. It turns out that reading can be so simple. STRONG AND WATERPROOF, NO FEAR OF DAMAGE - This thermometer for cooking has passed the IP67 waterproof certification. After use, you can directly clean it under the faucet or wipe it with a wet towel (warm reminder: please do not soak the digital thermometer for cooking in water or put it in the dishwasher). The shell of the food thermometer for cooking is made of high-quality wear-resistant material, which can provide effective protection for the thermometer during use. EXQUISITE GIFT, SAFE CHOICE - Our instant read meat thermometer packaging is simple and exquisite, and can be given as a holiday gift to relatives and friends who like cooking. Each kitchen thermometer has undergone a strict quality inspection process, please rest assured to buy. If you have any questions before or after purchase, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best answers and help.
